comment: Celebrating by finding out a bit more about our amazing MH & LD Nurses . Q1 . The lecturer who inspired / inspires you the most during your training / undergraduate programme and why ? Please share .

(m / multi-sentence

                              :op3 "LD"
                              :op4 "Nurses")

                        :poss (w / we))))
      :snt2 (p / publication

            :op1 "Q1")
      :snt3 (a2 / and
            :op1 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (l / lecture-01)
                  :ARG0-of (ii / inspire-01
                        :ARG1 (y2 / you)
                        :time (a3 / and
                              :op1 (p3 / program
                                    :mod (t / train-01
                                          :ARG2 y2))
                              :op2 (p4 / program
                                    :mod (u / undergraduate)
                                    :poss y2)))
                  :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91

                              :ARG0 p2
                              :ARG1 y2)
                        :ARG3 (m3 / most)))
            :op2 (c2 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG1 ii)
            :polarity (a4 / amr-unknown))
      :snt4 (s / share-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y3 / you)
            :ARG1 s
            :ARG0 y3))

comment: would always support me . She has inspired me to take some chances to gain more experience by volunteering abroad and have a placement in West Wales where I'm now working . Diolch Ruth
